title: Portugal and Spain trade gold and sugar

content.prompt: Which country has an absolute advantage in sugar production?

choices.label: Neither Spain nor Portugal, because both require fewer labor hours to produce a unit of gold than to produce a unit of sugar.
Spain, because the opportunity cost of sugar in terms of gold is lower.
Spain, because it requires fewer total labor hours than Portugal to produce a unit of sugar.
Portugal, because it requires more total labor hours than Spain to produce a unit of sugar.
Portugal, because it takes only a quarter of an hour to produce a unit of sugar.
